DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will study the effect of Adalimumab on the bone microstructure. - Trial with medicinal product
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Adalimumab on the Bone Microstructure in Crohn's Disease (CD) Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: CDAI > 220 und < 450 Biologika naiv CD seit > 6 Monaten Exclusion criteria: other TNFBlocker Steroids > 40 mg Malignoma in der Anamnesis
